import Image2 from './src/Components/download.jpeg'; import laf from './src/Components/MPA-pic.jpg'; export default function Projects() { return (

My Projects

Animal intrusion detection and alert system

•Developed a real-time monitoring system to detect animal intrusions in designated areas using Raspberry Pi and Pi Camera.

•Implemented the Haar Cascade algorithm for object detection to accurately identify animals like elephants and tigers.

•Integrated the Telegram Bot API to send real-time alerts to users, notifying them with the name of the detected animal.

METRO RECLAIM: A SMART LOST AND FOUND SYSTEM

• Developed a web-based application to serve as a centralized platform for managing lost and found items.

• Implemented role-based access control for Admin and User roles, enabling user authentication.

• Facilitated lost item reporting with detailed item descriptions, image uploads, and location information.

• Integrated search functionality for users to filter and search items based on specific criteria like item description, date.

        );     }
